SEARCH

Interface ClientMessagesInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientMessages
public interface ClientMessagesInterface extends Remote
Interface of the ClientMessage, that is used by the server to send message to the client.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • run

      void run(Info_itf_Impl inf) throws RemoteException, NotBoundException
      run the gui, needs to be outside of the constructor, because the info is incomplete until connection is confirmed
      Parameters:
      inf - info of the user launching the gui
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Connection issues
      NotBoundException - RMI Connection issues

    • displayMessage

      void displayMessage(String s) throws RemoteException
      Display message inside gui
      Parameters:
      s - string to display
      Throws:

      Display message inside gui, but green
      Parameters:
      s - string to display
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Connection issues

    • displayMessage

      void displayMessage(String user, String s) throws RemoteException
      Display message with user name
      Parameters:
      user - Username of the sender
      s - string to display
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Connection issues

    • displayMessage

      void displayMessage(ArrayList<String> ss) throws RemoteException
      Display multiple messages (used to load history)
      Parameters:
      ss - ArraList containing all strings to display
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Connection issues
